title: Even Less About Ajax
html: Has anyone noticed that the subsequent products at ajaxLaunch have been even less about Ajax than ajaxWrite was? I mean, ajaxOS? Sounds like .mac with a XUL launcher. The shame is that that's got potential to be cool, but not by co-opting the Ajax buzz.
body: Has anyone noticed that the subsequent products at ajaxLaunch have been even less about Ajax than ajaxWrite was? I mean, ajaxOS? Sounds like .mac with a XUL launcher. The shame is that that's got potential to be cool, but not by co-opting the Ajax buzz.
